item.description:
Many 4K summits are an easy hike from this location. Hike before or after camping with us.


The tent site is 8.22 mi from the Lincoln woods trailhead
It should take us 4 hr 50 min, and remember we will be carrying our overnight pack. The good news is that the trail is an old railroad bed and so not much climbing.
Elev Gain +357 ft
Elev Loss -1433 ft
Elev Change -1076 ft





be prepared to remove boots and cross a river. water shoes/crocs helpful. A 2 way radio will be used after 4pm to communicate with late arrivals channel 9


What we do need is your RSVP and contact information if you would like to join us.


Garfield, Galehead, the Bonds and Owls head are all in hiking distance from here, many options, but we still need to hike back to the trail head.

13 Falls (a.k.a. Camp 13) In Pemigewasset Wilderness Area; junction of Franconia Brook Trail, Lincoln Brook Trail, and Twin Brook Trail Tent site No shelter, 9 hardened single tent pads, composting outhouse, dish washing area

Fee: Yes $8
water :Franconia Brook
bear box:Yes


RSVP if your game for this adventure and post your comments and suggestions.

$8 fee for the tent sites paid to the tentkeeper.
A lead group will secure spots prepaid by the later arrivals.

Communication is essential. RSVP and answer the contact information.
item.name: 13 Falls Hike and Camp in the Pemigewasset Wilderness
